Name: PartsUnlimited
Message: Learn how to use the agile boards

Fields.Value: As developer, I want to create a Azure website and update it from Visual Studio so that we can get to work with no delay.
As developer, I want to setup a Team Project with GIT and CI, so that every check-in will automatically trigger a build from source to the Azure web site.
As project lead, I want to start visualizing my backlog on a Kanban board.
As project lead, I want to set up a dashboard that captures key engineering metrics the team will use daily.
As developer, I want us to extend the CI into an automated release pipeline with stages, so that we can add progressive testing to each stage and automate deployment.
As ops guy, I have never seen this level of traffic to the site and AI is showing us unexpected bottlenecks and hangs where the app calls out to the recommendation service. Can you guys do something?
As dev manager, with multiple teams, I now need to manage a hierarchical backlog for the enterprise.

As dev manager, I want to move our legacy MRP system (on Linux and Java) to IaaS, so that we can get control of it back, and integrate it with Project Unicorn so that we can build inventory to order rather than to forecast.
As an Ops guy, I want to ensure that the legacy MRP system configuration is consistent.
Ops needs the ability to quickly roll back to a known good state in the event of a critical problem in production.
As a business owner, I would like to know how much our historical spend is to help project future spend for budgeting + financials.
As ops guy, I'd like to make sure I am notified anytime public availability is impacted for key user scenarios
As ops guy, I'd like to keep the business owners happy ensuring there is no wasted spend in cloud resources.
As a marketeer i want our website to be performant and available around the world
We want to make frequent enhancements to the MRP application and need to modernize the application from its current legacy state.
Hackathon: DevOps Challenge Documents for Ignite
I want to ensure I have a seamless pipeline from checking in my code in VSO and have it deployed automatically to my Azure Website.
As developer, I want a clone of the Phoenix order entry and inventory database, so that we can work clean and decoupled from the Phoenix legacy team.
As tester, I need to test the website on all the relevant broswers and devices and be sure that it can handle our load.
As developer, I want to use Azure Machine Learning to provide a recommendations engine behind the website.
As marketer, I want to run an A|B test on alternative Web Sites using Application Insights.

As marketeer, I want us to reuse the web assets for apps on Android and iOS with corporate branding, and I will want to be able to update the device apps with every marketing promotion. That will mean using Cordova.
As dev, I can fix the hangs by simply turning off the setting in the Project K config file to the recommendations system and we'll monitor again..
As ops guy, I want to make sure our autoscale policies can handle the load.
Dev and Ops need to work together to have the ability to automate the creation of the entire Phoenix project website infrastructure and app from source code.
As dev, I'll create a new web and mobile site for direct customer shipment for self-service or store managers use so that backorders and crosshipments can be captured right away.
As the infra guy, I want to use the CDN to speed up our graphics use and large file loads and monitor the performance impact.
Add personlization to the product offering
Verify the product catalogue can support Amazon integration loads
Add Personlization to the ordering process
